notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: CCK and AR conceived the study, designed the experiments, and supervised the project. JMT performed the research. DS contributed to the immunoblot and RT-PCR analyses. SS contributed in the immunohistochemistry analysis. MA helped with the AVM and control sample preparation. CCK, AR, and JMT analyzed the data. AR and JMT jointly prepared the manuscript draft. CCK edited the draft. The authors have read and approved the final manuscript.
